name: Simon
tagline: A Simple Monitor Single Page Application
body:
### Welcome to Simon JS.
Simon JS is a library that helps you monitor the status of your development infrastructure.

You can easily monitor build jobs on applications like [Jenkins](http://jenkins-ci.org/), software quality projects on tools like [Sonarqube](http://www.sonarqube.org/) and services on infrastructure monitoring tools like [Nagios](http://www.nagios.org/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
